subject: Football
Agents (Business)
Blacks
Discrimination
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: One of the more intriguing concepts to emerge in the N.F.L. recently was a suggestion that there should be an initiative for players to consider African-Americans as they pick agents and lawyers.
snippet: One of the more intriguing concepts to emerge in the N.F.L. recently was a suggestion that there should be an initiative for players to consider African-Americans as they pick agents and lawyers.
